SqlQueryStrings.SqlQueryString: SELECT X.QueryName AS 'Query Name',X.QueryDescription AS 'Query Description',Y.QueryType,Z.UserName AS 'Created By',X.CreatedDate AS 'Created Date' FROM PM_Queries X, PM_QueryTypes Y, PM_Users Z WHERE X.RequirementId = @RequirementId AND X.QueryTypeId = Y.QueryTypeId AND X.CreatedBy = Z.User_Id
